NATIONAL EDUCATION ASSOCIATION
1201 SIXTEENTH STREET, N. W., WASHINGTON 6, D. C.
April 26, 1957
Miss Judith B. Gsns
NAEB
National Headquarters
lU Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Miss Gans:
Thank you for your notice that there was an error in billing
us for the NAEB-TV Research Fact Sheets. I know this happens
frequently in our office in relation to complimentary exchanges.
Enclosed is my check to pay my personal dues until January 1,
1958.
gj| nncxva T ir -
Anna L. Hyer
Associate Executive Secretary
